title: Presbyterian Revenge Recipe
full_text:
Presbyterian Revenge Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/4
ounce
simple syrup
1/4
ounce
lemon juice
3/4
ounce
Cynar
1 1/2
ounces
Black Grouse scotch
Soda water
Grapefruit twist
, to garnish
Directions
Combine simple syrup, lemon juice, Cynar, and Scotch in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass. Add a splash of soda. Squeeze grapefruit twist over top and use as garnish.
